select new KStockDto ( ks.KStockNo, ks.Desp, ks.Active, ks.TS, ks.CreatedDate, ks.CreatedUserId, ks.UpdatedDate, ks.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00010 as ks where ks.Active = true
